code: export async function fetchProducts(source){let query=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:"jaws";let limit=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:10;const res=await fetch("/api/search?source=".concat(source,"&query=").concat(encodeURIComponent(query),"&limit=").concat(limit));if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch products");return res.json();}
